question: Many people believe that music is just a form of entertainment, whilst others believe that music has a much larger impact on society today.Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
text: A  number of people  deem that entertaining is the sole purpose of music, while it is still believed that there are many further upsides which have been discovered by the ones who listen to it on a regular basis.In my notion, tune is not only a kind of entertainment, but it is  also beneficial to human somehow.

When people  want their mental body to be satisfied, they may start to look for things that could meet their own demands.Today, some sort of entertainment such as albums or songs could be easily found on the internet, which might be explained by the fact that technological developments has made it possible to find it easily, leading to an increasing number of people finding opera for relaxation, which is more than that of those who use other methods.Additionally, we could observe that soul is played with a great frequency  in parties or concerts where attracts a large amount of attendees  than other different types of events for it boosts their feelings of enjoyment.Therefore, it is widely assumed that melodies are just used for entertaining.

On the other hand, some people have been of a different view about the advantages of singing which ranges from individuals to society.Firstly, music could be a useful connector in social bonds that makes your relationship to be ameliorated.For instance, people commonly have a tendency to build a new relationship with those who has shared interest, in this case, you could make new friends or at least have a conversation more easily with the strangers about. Subsequently, to become more affluent and renowned, those who have talent for singing or expertise relevant to melody often works as composers or singers.
